title: Berserker Rage
data:
{{version025}}
{{Flavour|Sends the user into a berserk rage. Going berserk temporarily increases health, speed, and damage dealt in melee. It will time out quickly outside of combat, but may be extended by multiple kills. While berserk, almost all actions other than movement and melee combat are prevented. When the rage expires, the user will be briefly slowed and occasionally may even pass out, and will be unable to berserk again for a short time.}}

'''Berserker Rage''' is a monster-only spell that causes the caster to go [[berserk]], increasing their speed and damage output for the duration.
